alert.note: Alert for Extreme Western Allegany; Garrett (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 28 at 10:41AM EDT until March 28 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow showers expected. Total snow accumulations of two to four inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Garrett and Extreme Western Allegany Counties. * WHEN...Until 8 PM EDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Visibilities may drop rapidly at times in snow squalls. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates could approach or exceed 1 inch per hour and visibility could be reduced to a quarter mile or less in squalls.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents.
